description:
Fufu Tools is a toolbox with a collection of gadgets.


> With several starts(Branches), but just one end(Release)~

> [!TIP]
> 此版本的所有Issue/PR，请见 [Milestone 1.4.0](https://github.com/DuckDuckStudio/Fufu_Tools/milestone/9?closed=1)
> 独立开发工具包仓库 → [DuckDuckStudio/Fufu_Dev_Tools](https://github.com/DuckDuckStudio/Fufu_Dev_Tools)

## 修改

### 新功能
- feat：文件对比清理 by @Pfolg in https://github.com/DuckDuckStudio/Fufu_Tools/pull/229

### 修复
- fix(iss): 在兼容 x64 的设备上使用 64Bit 安装模式 by @DuckDuckStudio in https://github.com/DuckDuckStudio/Fufu_Tools/commit/0ab7f912bc8431bc3c84a47db50a90c68dc7571e
- fix: 修正 DEV-PACK 和 自动打包py(w)文件 工具的类型检查错误 by @DuckDuckStudio in https://github.com/DuckDuckStudio/Fufu_Tools/commit/8be156d6a3742d5be1575fde6a1f2c2e9b1e69df & https://github.com/DuckDuckStudio/Fufu_Tools/commit/af191d2d4a6ebe2514d552dcb78675ce7863da8e

### 弃用
- chore: 移除过时的环境配置文件 by @DuckDuckStudio in https://github.com/DuckDuckStudio/Fufu_Tools/commit/21846b740ef7b4381fcf351cfc695c47fa0f5f5f
- chore: 移除 翻译 工具 by @DuckDuckStudio in https://github.com/DuckDuckStudio/Fufu_Tools/commit/39c14424982e7757e96a653034888375c0da8eb3
- chore(主程序): 移除对 Unix 系统的处理，因为该程序只计划适配 Windows by @DuckDuckStudio in https://github.com/DuckDuckStudio/Fufu_Tools/commit/aa4ca45924f7a00193bbefbb8b27ab3505e87fed
- chore: 移除 爬取搜索 工具 by @DuckDuckStudio in https://github.com/DuckDuckStudio/Fufu_Tools/commit/5086e00bf381c80132694db5e545d14094f80781
- chore: 移除不再更新的 WSA 小工具 by @DuckDuckStudio in https://github.com/DuckDuckStudio/Fufu_Tools/commit/ce9d12da96fe929eb8668e1902d7eeb4c057b766

### 依赖
- build(deps): bump nuitka from 2.7.6 to 2.7.12 in https://github.com/DuckDuckStudio/Fufu_Tools/pull/220 & https://github.com/DuckDuckStudio/Fufu_Tools/pull/222 & https://github.com/DuckDuckStudio/Fufu_Tools/pull/223 & https://github.com/DuckDuckStudio/Fufu_Tools/pull/225 & https://github.com/DuckDuckStudio/Fufu_Tools/pull/227
- build(deps): bump pyinstaller from 6.14.1 to 6.15.0 in https://github.com/DuckDuckStudio/Fufu_Tools/pull/226 & https://github.com/DuckDuckStudio/Fufu_Tools/pull/231
- build(deps): bump pywin32 from 310 to 311 in https://github.com/DuckDuckStudio/Fufu_Tools/pull/228
- build(deps): bump requests from 2.32.4 to 2.32.5 in https://github.com/DuckDuckStudio/Fufu_Tools/pull/233

本版本版本号为1.4.0
首发日期2025/8/23
-> Code by 鸭鸭「カモ」 / DuckStudio
